snippet: Rio Caraeff, who has led Vevo since its beginning in 2009, will depart at the end of the year.
abstract: Rio Caraeff, chief executive of Vevo, online music-video platform that supplies some of most popular material on YouTube, is leaving the company at end of 2014.
lead_paragraph: Rio Caraeff, who has led Vevo since its beginning in 2009, will depart at the end of the year.

headline.main: Head of Music-Video Source Will Step Down From Post
headline.print_headline: Head of Music-Video Source Will Step Down From Post
